posts.post_content:
Price are net to me and delivered. SOLD here or via PM trumps any offers or negotiations. 

SGC 2 HOFer Lajoie Throwing $650. 

Insanely nice front. Technical grade due to small spots of loss on the back. A 
super nice card. 

PSA 4 HOFer Jimmy Collins $450. Great centering and color. ***SOLD***

Thanks for looking!
